constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 105 (Wednesday, June 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. POCAN:
H.R. 3946.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H2893]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Pell Grant Preservation and Expansion Act of 2021
